ref: 1924 údañcati ʻ raises, throws up ʼ RV., ʻ ladles out ʼ AV. 2. *upāñcati, úpācati ʻ lifts up e.g. water ʼ ŚBr. [Phon. the mod. forms may derive from either: √añc]
Pk. udaṁcaï ʻ rises ʼ, udaṁcida -- ʻ thrown up ʼ;
H. ũcnā ʻ to tighten the strings of a bed ʼ;
M. õċṇẽ ʻ to shake the winnowing basket in a certain way ʼ.
